text: Dan Goeb Patrick (born Dannie Scott Goeb; April 4, 1950) is an American radio talk show host, television broadcaster, and politician. He has been the 42nd lieutenant governor of Texas since January 2015, under Greg Abbott. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Texas Category:American radio personalities Category:American political activists Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Houston Category:Members of the Texas Legislature Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dan Patrick (politician)
